          <title>
            <string language="en">Myths & Facts Online -Israel Roots</string>

-</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a presentation of the myths about roots of the Jewish people in Israel alongside the actual facts. The document contains several maps</string>

          </description>

Le document contient plusieurs cartes</string>

γεγονότα. Το έγγραφο περιέχει διάφορους χάρτες</string>
